titleStmt.title: A proclamation, regulating the prices of ale and drinking-beer
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given under Our Signet, at Edinburgh, the seventh day of December, and of Our Reign, the twenty eight year, 1676.
Signed: Al. Gibson, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: creased and stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
